title: Day 3, Still no Ticket Response?????
body:
I've submitted a ticket for my account last Saturday, but I still have no response for the ticket. Why are the ticket times 3 days out?
I have been unable to play League of legends or log into the website on the account, even tried recovering the password, but I've never gotten the recovery E-mail.

Riot what is going on with your customer service??

replies.body:
Wait times are a bit longer at the moment due to the volume of tickets that have been submitted recently. If you hang on for a bit longer, we'll have a specialist with you when possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
